availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: D. R. Burbank (Union County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Native of Ireland. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Owned twenty-seven enslaved persons in Union County in 1860. Hired enslaved persons, Phil and Dick, from Carrie [Ten] and Angeline [Ten] in Union County in 1864.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union, p. 76. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Union, p. 20. KYR-0001-005-0040.
